name: After the Rain
description:
Book by Rose Napoli
Music & Lyrics by Suzy Wilde
Directed by Marie Farsi

Her parents are famous. Her boyfriend is stupid. And Suzie is a mess. When she accepts a mature piano student obsessed with mastering only one song, Erik Satie’s “Gymnopedie No. 1”, struggling songwriter Suzie’s life takes an unforeseen turn. Full of family turmoil, life’s complexities, and centred around a devastating discovery, After the Rain is a musical based on a true story about the healing power of music.

name: Northern Lights Painting Workshop
description: Paint the Northern Lights over a serene lake at this cozy, beginner-friendly paint session! With step-by-step guidance, you'll create your own colourful night sky masterpiece while enjoying tea in a relaxed, inspiring atmosphere. No experience needed - just bring your creativity!

name: The Last of Us Improvised
description:
We take the zombie post-apocalyptic world and recreate it through improv using your suggestions. What would Joel and Ellie do if their settlement was in Trinity Bellwoods instead of Wyoming? Which Toronto icons have been infected by the Cordyceps? Who lives and who dies in this version? You decide!

Coming from the award-winning EverythingImprovised crew who have brought you smash hits like The White Lotus Improvised, The Bear Improvised, House of the Dragon Improvised, Bridgerton Improvised, Euphoria Improvised, and Riverdale Improvised, now brings you an improvised version of one of the best shows on television. Toronto’s best and brightest comics bring to life the characters you’ve grown to love and hate.

name: Unveiling The M Factor: An Evening of Women's Empowerment
description:
Join us for a women’s only event, a screening of the film The M-Factor: Shredding the Silence on Menopause, followed by a Q&A with wellness leaders, including Dr. Tiffany Dzugan, Naturopathic Doctor and Menopause Practitioner, and other experts who are leading this important conversation.

Wine. Refreshments. Raffle.
